summary:
Multilingual professional and International Business enthusiast, I cherish the opportunity to further my interest in public/private sector interactions via my work as Head of Public Financing, EU project management,  as well as stimulating & facilitating SME growth and broader market reach. I am a versatile individual passionate about advancing my skillset and expanding horizons, something I believe to be essential for our rapidly evolving society. Described by others as a Cosmopolitan due to living in 6 different countries (Belgium, Poland, Russia, Ukraine, USA and The Netherlands) I have an open and adaptive mindset always keen to learn and engage in challenging contexts.

☑︎ International Business 
☑︎ Project management & EU funds
☑︎ EU cooperation
